alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; Lonoke; Monroe; Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Woodruff, southeastern Independence, Prairie, Jackson, east central Lonoke, northern Monroe and eastern White Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tuckerman to Parkers Corner. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport... Brinkley... Augusta... Des Arc... Clarendon... Hazen... De Valls Bluff... Bald Knob... Carlisle... Tuckerman... Diaz... Swifton... Patterson... Grubbs... Fredonia... Oil Trough... Russell... Jacksonport... West Point... Tupelo... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Independence; Jackson; Lonoke; Monroe; Prairie; White; Woodruff
